text: Momin mard aur momin auratein, yeh sab ek dusre ke rafeeq(comrades/allies) hain, bhalayi ka hukum dete aur burayi se roakte hain, Namaz qayam karte hain, zakat dete hain aur Allah aur uske Rasool ki itaat karte hain, yeh woh log hain jinpar Allah ki rehmat nazil hokar rahegi. Yaqeenan Allah sab par gaalib aur hakeem o dana hai
